property.name: Rules
property.value: {MULTI STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire or Nature creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, break 2 of your shields. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ At the end of your turn, you may destroy all creatures that have power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy all non-psychic creatures that have power 3000 or less. Then destroy all psychic creatures that have power 5000 or less. TWINPACT ■ Choose one of your opponent's cards that costs 3 or less in the battle zone and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. If it's a Dragon, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Water or Fire Dragon that costs 3 or more (When one of your water or fire dragons that costs 3 or more attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of the following: ► Your opponent chooses one of their creatures that has the lowest power and destroys it: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand.
